home.errorMsg: Unable to connect to the query backend or an unknown error occurred.

embed.noServerIpMsg: The server IP parameter must be provided in the URL.
embed.unableConnectMsg: Unable to connect to query backend.
embed.offlineMsg: The server is unresponsive or non-existent

embedG.title: Embedded in your web page
embedG.description: Adjust the options below to preview the effect in real time, then copy the generated code.

imgG.title: Generate a link to the status image
imgG.description: Copy the link below and you can use it in your forum signature file or Markdown document.

joinM.title: Joining Server
joinM.body1: We will launch your local MinecraftBE client and automatically add the server information.
joinM.warning1: If you have both the International and NetEase versions of MC installed,
joinM.warning2: please select the International version to open
joinM.warning3: , or the link will not work!
joinM.body2: If you haven't downloaded the client, click the button below. If it fails to launch, check your browser permissions or switch browsers.
